sets.name: Defensive Utility
sets.description: The Defense investment lets it survive a Close Combat from Cobalion.

sets.name: Defensive Spinner
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds Timid Volcanion.

sets.name: All-Out Attacker
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds Salazzle after two Flame Charges.

sets.name: CurseLax
sets.description: Special Defense investment avoids being 2HKOed by Choice Specs Toxtricity's Boomburst.

sets.name: Pivot
sets.description: The given spread allows Crobat to take two Darkest Lariat from Choice Scarf Zarude and outspeed Noivern.

sets.name: Wallbreaker
sets.description: Given spread outspeeds uninvested base 60 Pokemon such as Sylveon and Galarian Weezing.

sets.name: Defog
sets.description: An alternative set of 252 HP / 112 Def / 144 SpD can be run to better take on Giga Drain Roserade. 1 EV in Speed and a Relaxed nature can be run to still outspeed Sylveon while underspeeding other Pokemon to have a slow U-turn and switch to a teammate safely.

sets.name: Stealth Rock
sets.description: Full HP investment and 8 Defense EVs avoid being OHKOed by +2 Cobalion's Close Combat.

sets.name: Vincune
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds Timid Toxtricity.

sets.name: Wallbreaker
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds uninvested Rhyperior.

sets.name: Defog
sets.description: Speed investment allows it to outspeed base 90 Speed Pokemon such as Roserade and Lucario.

sets.name: Defensive Pivot
sets.description: This spread avoids being 2HKOed by Nidoqueen's Thunderbolt and outspeeds Adamant Golurk. Haze can be run if the team really needs it, but Milotic is much more useful with any of the other options given.

sets.name: Stealth Rock
sets.description: This spread allows Metagross to take two Flamethrower from Togekiss and outspeeds Adamant Golurk.

sets.name: Mixed Wall
sets.description: The Special Defense investment avoids the 2HKO from Earth Power Nidoqueen after Stealth Rock damage. Sets with full investment in either Defense or Special Defense can be run, but they give up the ability to check specific threats such as the aforementioned Nidoqueen.

sets.name: Stealth Rock
sets.description: 16 Attack EVs take the most advantage of an Adamant nature in defensive sets.

sets.name: Choice Band
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds base 65 Pokemon such as Alomomola and Umbreon.

sets.name: Swords Dance
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds base 65 Pokemon such as Alomomola and Umbreon.

sets.name: Physically Defensive Defogger
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds Adamant Golurk.

sets.name: Specially Defensive Defogger
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds Adamant Golurk.

sets.name: Stealth Rock
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds Alolan Marowak.

sets.name: Swords Dance
sets.description: The Attack investment allows it to OHKO standard Milotic with Megahorn after a Swords Dance boost.

sets.name: Mixed Wall
sets.description: The Special Defense investment avoids the 2HKO from uninvested Giga Drain Roserade.

sets.name: Defensive
sets.description: Optimal spread, run Impish Nature if you use Knock Off over Scald.

sets.name: Shell Smash Sweeper
sets.description: Defensive investment lets it take Earthquake from Choice Scarf Flygon and Hyper Voice from defensive Sylveon after Shell Smash drops and Stealth Rock damage. The Speed investment outspeeds Choice Scarf Zarude after Shell Smash.

sets.name: Offensive Pivot
sets.description: The Speed investment allows it to outspeed 60 base Pokemon such as Sylveon and Empoleon.

sets.name: Defensive Pivot
sets.description: The Speed investment allows it to outspeed 60 base Pokemon such as Sylveon and Empoleon, but a set with no Speed investment can be run in case a slow pivot is preferred. Haze can be run over Draco Meteor if the team really needs it for Pokemon such as Demon Metagross or Registeel.

sets.name: Cleric
sets.description: Special Defense investment lets Sylveon survive a +2 Fire Blast from Mega Houndoom after Stealth Rock damage.

sets.name: Offensive Pivot
sets.description: The Defense investment avoids being 2HKOed by Choice Scarf Zarude's Darkest Lariat.

sets.name: Specially Defensive
sets.description: The few Speed EVs allow it to outspeed Sassy Incineroar and Golisopod, with the latter usually running a spread that allows it to outspeed base 50 Speed Pokemon. 20 Atk EVs put Diamond Storm in range to always trigger Emergency Exit.

sets.name: SubTox
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds Pangoro.

sets.name: Specially Defensive Pivot
sets.description: Speed investment allows it to outspeed base 60 Pokemon even with a negative nature. Special Attack investment allows it to OHKO Cobalion with Overheat.

sets.name: Suicide Lead
sets.description: This set is oftenly found in hyper offense teams that get advantage of the opposing Pokemon being affected by Sticky Web.

sets.name: Swords Dance
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds Gligar and Cresselia.

sets.name: Choice Band
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds Gligar and Cresselia.

sets.name: Rapid Spin Pivot
sets.description: 248 Speed EVs still outspeed Honchkrow, Tyrantrum, and base 70 Pokemon like Hoopa and Volcanion.

sets.name: Offensive Spikes
sets.description: Speed investment lets Golisopod outspeed base 50 Pokemon like Registeel.

sets.name: Offensive Utility
sets.description: The given spread lets Dhelmise take two Dragon Pulse from Mega Sceptile and a Hurricane from Noivern, as well as outspeed uninvested base 50 Pokemon such as Diancie and Registeel.

sets.name: RestTalk
sets.description: Speed investment outspeeds base 60 Pokemon.

sets.name: Trick Room Sweeper
sets.description: 15 Defense IVs and a Lonely nature are run so Beast Boost boosts Stakataka's Attack after a KO.

sets.name: Slush Rush Wallbreaker
sets.description: The Speed investment allows it to outspeed Mega Sceptile and base 80 Choice Scarf users such as Regidrago when hail is active. Be careful with Trace users such as Gardevoir that will take advantage of your own weather.
